Header: Basic Computer Course at SFHQ-West Ends
Content: The 3rd phase of the computer training programme, designed for all ranks serving in Divisions, Brigades, Regimental Headquarters, Units, Training Schools and formations under command to the  Security Force Headquarters - West (SFHQ-West) got underway during 28 June - 31 July at the SFHQ-West library. The course, offered by Orient Academy (Pvt) Ltd following coordination done by Major General Sathyapriya Liyanage, Commander, Security Forces - West, trained a group of 30 Army personnel. The closing ceremony took place on Tuesday (31), headed by Brigadier Jinendra Thanthiriwatta, Brigadier General Staff as the Chief Guest. The best three students in the course were awarded certificates and medals during the ceremony.
